content: विविच् {c3c} {c7c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To separate, divide, remove from; विविनच्मि दिवः सुरान् <ls>Bk. 6. 36.</ls> {@--2@} To discern, discriminate. {@--3@} To judge, ascertain, determine; रे खल तव खलु चरितं विदुषामग्रे विविच्य वक्ष्यामि <ls>Bv. 1. 108.</ls> {@--4@} To describe, treat of. {@--5@} To tear up, rend asunder.
